title: UEFA Champions League 2004-2005 [English] [2CD]
description:
Electronic Arts and UEFA light up the football pitch with a stunning new game that puts you straight into the pressure cooker that is UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE Ã¢â€žÂ¢ 2004 - 2005.

EA SPORTSÃ¢â€žÂ¢ re-creates the real life world of top flight football to make this the first mission-based football game. There are over 50 challenging on and off-field missions to overcome throughout the domestic and European season. Can you handle the pressure of having to win 2-0, or to be told by your new boss that your main striker has to be sold?

Choose one of any clubs out of a possible 239 -from the FA Premier League, German Bundesliga, Spanish Primera Liga, Italian Serie A and French Ligue 1. There are a number of extra clubs outside of these leagues to take to Champions League glory.

UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE Ã¢â€žÂ¢ 2004 - 2005 not only boasts an all new set piece system, but also includes a completely innovative feature, - EA SPORTSÃ¢â€žÂ¢ Talk Radio, the only place to hear the views of the people who pay your wages on the ultimate fansÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ forum.
